Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 109th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Rickey Rubio (COL)...
Injured on 5/31/2015 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/2015, off Zachary Carrero (COL)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2015...
Injured on 9/6/2016 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2016...
Injured on 8/20/2017 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 6/25/2018 (Going to CIN: SS Clifford Brantner, RF Jc Salomon, P Ronald Diep. Going to STL: P Alfonso Rodriguez, CF Christopher Miller, P Bill Johnson)...
